long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The camfire browser add-on lets you be online and notifies you of new calls.

Camfire always transmits the video streams encrypted and directly from computer to computer, even when communicating with up to 8 participants. In addition, the streams are always end-to-end encrypted using WebRTC technology.

Camfire is GDPR compliant and ISO 27001 certified. Camfire uses the ViewMyBrowser technology and is therefore "Software-Made-in-Germany" and "Software-Hosted-in-Germany".
